org.automation.utils

Class FileSystemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.automation.utils.FileSystemHandler

  • public final class FileSystemHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    RemoveOldReports removes all the reports older than X days. User can set the decision to delete the files in properties file.
    Class is final to avoid extend.

    Apr 7, 2021
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    User1
